Title: Includes remedial services, homework or childcare as the transportation responsibility of the city school district located in New York City
Summary: Includes remedial services, homework or childcare as the transportation responsibility of the city school district located in a city having a population of one million or more.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to including remedial services, homework or childcare as the transportation responsibility of the city school district located in a city having a population of one million or more
